channel.title: Magic spell timers
channel.description: Ok I am using a Pi base ATM and I have been trying to make ice barrage increase in speed when a certain item is equipted. I came up with a code but it did not work at all. So I was wondering if someone could help me with this. It would be highly appreciated.

item.title: Magic spell timers
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

Mhm i know that and I know how to change the ice barrage speed. I want to add an exception so that when a certain weapon is equipted the ice barrage timer is increased causing the ice barrage to barrage faster.

Read full topic

item.title: Magic spell timers
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

yo dude 1345:

Ok I am using a Pi base ATM and I have been trying to make ice barrage increase in speed when a certain item is equipted. I came up with a code but it did not work at all. So I was wondering if someone could help me with this. It would be highly appreciated.

I don’t think you can completely CHANGE the speed of ONE weapon, but you’ll have to increase the Ice Barrage speed as IS. Because as the server runs, it’s taking from the file that already SHOWS the ice barrage speed. :]

Read full topic
